attributes.action: Remove VAT and Standing Charge on energy supplies for at least 12 months
attributes.additional_details: The fairest way to help every single user of energy
attributes.background: To remove VAT and Standing Charges from energy supplies, this is the fairest way to help every single user of power, only pay for what you use. Temporarily for 12 Months

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621407
